attributes.action: extend the mobility scheme to recipients of High Rate Attendance Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the mobility scheme is only available to people in receipt of Disability Living Allowance.   We would like that scheme extended to people who also are in receipt of High Rate Attendance Allowance, older people need more help with their mobility yet they are penalised for being over 65 at the time their claim for benefit was made.
